report.name: visuprojprin

dataSource.name: Q_VISUPROJ
dataSource.select:
SELECT ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----- Caractéristiques de la ligne BIP -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
bip.pid dc_pid, bip.pcle dc_cle, '(' || bip.pnom || ')' dc_nomproj, TO_CHAR(info.codsg, 'FM0000000') || ' - ' || info.sigdep||'/'||info.sigpole dc_codsg, '(' || info.libdsg || ')' dc_libdsg, TO_CHAR(bip.dpcode, 'FM00000') dc_dpcode, '(' || trim(dp.dplib) || ')' dc_dplib, bip.airt dc_airt, '(' || app.alibel || ')' dc_alibel, bip.typproj dc_typproj, bip.arctype dc_arctype, bip.icpi dc_icpi, '(' || pi.ilibel || ')' dc_ilibel, pi.cada dc_cada, decode(rtrim(ltrim(bip.clicode)),'AB', bip.clicode, TO_CHAR(bip.clicode,'FM00000')) ||' - '||mo.clisigle || '('|| mo.clilib ||')' dc_mo, decode(rtrim(ltrim(bip.clicode_oper)),'AB', bip.clicode_oper, TO_CHAR(bip.clicode_oper,'FM00000')) ||' - '||mo2.clisigle || '('|| mo2.clilib ||')' dc_moOper, bip.metier dc_metier, bip.pnmouvra dc_resp, bip.codcamo || ' (' || trim(ca.clibca) || ')' dc_codcamo, ca.ctopact dc_ctopact, bip.topfer dc_topfer, bip.astatut dc_astatut, bip.adatestatut dc_adatestatut, bip.astatut || ' ('|| trim(pack_prodec2.f_get_lib_statut( bip.astatut)) || ') ' dc_statut, bip.codpspe dc_codpspe, bip.pcpi || ' (nom) (prénom) :' dc_pcpi, '(' || res.rnom || ') (' || res.rprenom || ')' dc_nomcp, bip.pobjet dc_objet, --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Eléments relatifs au budget --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- tbs.typeb dc_typeb, decode(tbs.typeb, 'A', 'Prop Fourn :', 'B', 'Prop Client :', 'C', 'Notifié :', 'D', 'Réservé :', 'E', 'Arbitré :', 'F', 'Consommé :', 'G', 'Cons/mois :', 'H', 'Réestimé :', 'I', 'Consommé Total :', 'J', 'Comptabilité :') dc_typ_lib, tbs.minus1 dc_minus1, tbs.n dc_n, tbs.plus1 dc_plus1, tbs.plus2 dc_plus2, tbs.plus3 dc_plus3, tbs.total dc_total, -- --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Eléments relatifs à la facturation interne --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Immos : ' || tbs.immo || ' KEURO' dc_immos_ke, 'F.I. : Dec N-1 : ' || tbs.fidec || ' KEURO' dc_factint_decn1_ke, 'Dec N-1 + An N: ' || tbs.fiannee || ' KEURO' dc_factint_n_ke, bip.PDATDEBPRE dc_datedebutligne FROM ligne_bip bip, ressource res, centre_activite ca, client_mo mo, client_mo mo2, struct_info info, dossier_projet dp, application app, proj_info pi, tmp_visuprojprin tbs WHERE 1 = 1 and bip.pcpi=res.ident and bip.codcamo=ca.codcamo and bip.clicode=mo.clicode and bip.clicode_oper=mo2.clicode and bip.codsg=info.codsg and bip.dpcode=dp.dpcode and bip.airt=app.airt and bip.icpi=pi.icpi and bip.pid = tbs.pid and tbs.numseq = :p_numseq_2 &P_WHERE ORDER BY bip.pid, tbs.typeb;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( rtrim ( ltrim ( bip.clicode_oper ) ) , 'AB' , bip.clicode_oper , TO_CHAR ( bip.clicode_oper , 'FM00000' ) ) || ' - ' || mo2.clisigle || '(' || mo2.clilib || ')'
decode ( rtrim ( ltrim ( bip.clicode ) ) , 'AB' , bip.clicode , TO_CHAR ( bip.clicode , 'FM00000' ) ) || ' - ' || mo.clisigle || '(' || mo.clilib || ')'

function.name: afterpform
beforepform
beforereport
afterreport
f_dc_immos_ke1formattrigger
f_dc_factint_decn1_ke1formattr
f_dc_factint_n_ke1formattrigge
